archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: DEAD?: POL TV
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
AMScreen system will be rolled out to the full Crown and WHS branch network to replace the existing PO TV system which is currently situated in a total of 394 branches, and comprises a system of 650 digital screens.
From an analysis of the current POTV system across the network, together with the learnings provided from the AMScreen branch trial. For planning purposes, it is planned that the 650 screens will be spilt as follows; • 215 x AMScreen Digital Screen 24” • 435 x AMScreen Digital Screen 40”
